examples.korean: These densely planted trees will make the building look like a tall, vertical forest. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이렇게 빽빽하게 심어진 나무들은 이 건물을 높고 수직의 숲처럼 보이게 만들 것입니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: These densely planted trees will make the building look like a tall, vertical forest. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: However, it takes between 20 to 50 years for a newly planted tree to grow large enough to be used in paper making. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 새롭게 심어진 나무가 종이를 만드는데 사용될 만큼 크게 자라려면 20년에서 50년이 걸려요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: However, it takes between 20 to 50 years for a newly planted tree to grow large enough to be used in paper making. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s good to see that researchers are working hard to change that image for Korea. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들에게 심어진 생각을 바꾸기 위해 연구진들이 심혈을 기울이는 것은 좋은 일입니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: It’s good to see that researchers are working hard to change that image for Korea. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A mustard seed, when planted, is less than any of the seeds that are on the earth; but when it is fully grown, it becomes the greatest of plants. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 땅에 심어진 겨자씨 하나는 이 세상 그 어느 씨보다도 작지만, 다 자라면 그 어떤 나무도 부럽지 않게 크게 자란다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: A mustard seed, when planted, is less than any of the seeds that are on the earth; but when it is fully grown, it becomes the greatest of plants. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At the end of the holiday season, either store the potted tree outside and bring it in again next year or plant it on an acreage, farm or wilderness area and buy another potted tree the following year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 명절 시즌이 끝날 때, 화분에 심어진 나무를 밖에 두었다가 다음 해에 다시 들여오거나, 아니면 나무를 넓은 터나, 농장, 또는 야생 시역에 심고 내년에는 또 다른 화분에 심겨진 나무를 사세요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: At the end of the holiday season, either store the potted tree outside and bring it in again next year or plant it on an acreage, farm or wilderness area and buy another potted tree the following year. Add to Wordbook
